dt: {bc}a place notorious for vice or corruption

et: after {et_link|sodom|Sodom:g}, destroyed by God for its wickedness in the Bible (Genesis 19)
shortdef: a place notorious for vice or corruption

dt: ancient city thought to be in the area now covered by the southwestern part of the {d_link|Dead Sea|Dead Sea:g}

shortdef: ancient city thought to be in the area now covered by the southwestern part of the Dead Sea
